text: Kharitonovia is a genus of araneomorph spiders in the family Dictynidae, containing the single species, Kharitonovia uzbekistanica. It was first described by S. L. Esyunin, Alireza Zamani & T. K. Tuneva in 2017, and is only found in Iran and Uzbekistan. ==References== ==External links== Category:Dictynidae Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera
title: Kharitonovia
